column5: So Bill how was the lap dance and ice cream?
So Pointed...was it good for you??? LOL.  I didn't even see that...probably a good thing too....
Well that two timin' bugger! I hope Joe doesn't see this. He'll be devastated.
HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA Thanks for making my day!

hmm. I didn't believe it when I saw it the first time in someone else's post with TJ pinning someone down trying to take off his pants or something. And now ...  I don't know if TJ is suitable for leading this family oriented site anymore ... ahh my eyes!  LOL
Yeah i got news for you i had to sleep in the truck because pointed was a little to frisky after that ...kept trying to spoon me
You guys break me up.  LOL  Pam
I think TJ has a thing for American guys....must be the accent.
As you can see I'm sitting right beside them and leaning as far away as I can.  Didn't want to get dripped on by anything   I meant ice cream, get your minds out of the gutter.   Joey
Hey, Glen - your centerfold act has officially been upstaged!
